name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack
display_help: Sonic Attack lets you use the power of sound waves to damage and weaken your foes.

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Shriek
powers.display_help: You let forth a quick Shriek, damaging your target and weakening their Damage Resistance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 2.5% chance per every percentage point targets health is below 50%
2.5% chance per every percentage point targets health is below 50%
-15.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 5s on target

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Scream
powers.display_help: Your Scream can cause serious damage to a target, while weakening their resistance to further damage. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Shockwave
powers.display_help: You can call forth a tremendous Shockwave that can knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 30° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Amplify
powers.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 42.50% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Sirens_Song
powers.display_help: You send forth a subsonic pulse which causes your foes to fall unconscious and take some minor damage. Your foes will remain unconscious for a good while, but will awaken if disturbed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 40 ft. radius 50° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 3.0 sleep for 35.76s on target after 0.25s delay

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Screech
powers.display_help: By bursting forth with this hypersonic Screech, you can disorient a target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Corruptor_Ranged.Sonic_Attack.Dreadful_Wail
powers.display_help: Your Dreadful Wail is so strong that most foes will be defeated by being subjected to it. Dreadful Wail deals Extreme Smashing and Energy damage to all nearby foes in addition to reducing their defense and disorienting them for a good while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
